sql.up: CREATE TABLE "Comment" (id text NOT NULL, content text NOT NULL, "createdAt" timestamp(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp, "updatedAt" timestamp(3) NOT NULL, "personaId" text NOT NULL, "userId" text NOT NULL, xata_updatedat timestamptz(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp, xata_id text NOT NULL DEFAULT 'rec_'::text || xata_private.xid()::text, xata_version int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, xata_createdat timestamptz(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp, CONSTRAINT "Comment_pkey" PRIMARY KEY (id))
